holidays.name: International Widow's Day
holidays.description: A day to recognize and support widows worldwide, raising awareness about the challenges they face and advocating for their rights and dignity.
holidays.origin: Established by the United Nations in 2011 to address the issues of widows, including poverty and social stigma, which affect millions globally.
holidays.funFact: Widows often face discrimination and poverty, yet many cultures historically neglected their rights, making this day crucial for global empathy and action.

holidays.name: National Pink Day (USA)
holidays.description: A cheerful day dedicated to celebrating the color pink in all its shades and forms, embracing its fun, vibrant, and sometimes rebellious connotations.
holidays.origin: An unofficial and playful observance created by color enthusiasts in the USA, popularized via social media challenges and fashion statements.
holidays.funFact: Pink was once a color associated with masculinity in the early 1900s before evolving into the feminine symbol it often represents today!

holidays.name: Go Skateboarding Day
holidays.description: An annual event encouraging people of all ages to hop on their skateboards and showcase their skills, creativity, and love for skating culture.
holidays.origin: Started by the International Association of Skateboard Companies in 2004 as a way to promote skateboarding and bring communities together.
holidays.funFact: Some cities organize huge skate jams and competitions; in 2010, a Guinness World Record was set with over 8000 skateboarders rolling together!

holidays.name: Upsy Daisy Day
holidays.description: A quirky day to perk up your spirits, encourage positivity, and brighten someone's day ‚Äî much like the cheerful 'upsy daisy' saying said to toddlers.
holidays.origin: Unofficial fun holiday from the UK that embraces optimism and the power of a smile through playful antics and kind gestures.
holidays.funFact: The phrase 'upsy daisy' likely originated from a gentle way to help children or animals stand up, now inspiring adult fun and silliness too!
